backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles and many typed crypto‑analytics data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to impacted frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/ANDROID_APK_BUILD_GUIDE.md: Guide for building the web app as an Android APK using Capacitor.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions and dark‑mode CSS for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: PWA‑ready HTML entry file with meta tags, icons, and bootstrap script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, screenshots, and display settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app switching between multi‑module mode and single‑tab Futures Monitor, with PWA setup and theming.
frontend/src/components/BinanceCredentia: UI panel for entering, saving, testing, and removing Binance API keys with validation and status display.
Displays confluence zones from backend or synthetic data, handling loading, errors, and live/cache state.
frontend/src/components/FlowVisualizatio: Visualizes capital flow data or synthetic flows and generates an interpretation summary based on intensity patterns.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing branding, copyright, and real‑time data status.
frontend/src/components/FuturesDashboard: Shows futures account data including open positions, with polling, refresh, error handling, and credential checks.
frontend/src/components/FuturesMonitor.t: Wraps authentication, profile setup, credentials panel, and futures dashboard in a gated monitor view.
Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with module navigation and live Binance connection status indicators.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/OpenPositionsTab: Displays Binance Futures open positions with formatted metrics, risk insights, and warnings.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for user profile setup with name/email fields and mutation‑based save handling.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Shows a conditional PWA installation prompt with platform-specific logic and dismiss handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinanceData.ts: Manages live Binance market data via WebSocket with fallback REST polling and cached updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinanceFuturesMoni: React-query hooks for checking, adding, removing, and testing Binance credentials and managing user profiles through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider handling auth client setup, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpenFuturesPositio: Fetches open Binance futures positions when authenticated and credentials exist, with error mapping and optional polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjectionsSyncGat: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAUpdateToast.ts: Checks for PWA updates and shows a persistent toast prompting the user to update.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks fetching and enriching various backend datasets, often augmented with live Binance data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables, utilities, animations, and component styles.
frontend/src/lib/binanceService.ts: Implements Binance Futures WebSocket client and related types, including reconnect logic and ticker parsing.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides Portuguese locale number, currency, percentage, compact number formatting, and rounding utilities.
frontend/src/lib/futuresPositionFormat.t: Formats futures prices, sizes, leverage, PnL, colors, and market labels for UI display.
frontend/src/lib/positionInsights.ts: Generates trading insights based on position metrics and provides icon and color helpers.
frontend/src/lib/projections.ts: Empty placeholder file for future projection utilities.
frontend/src/lib/pwaUtils.ts: PWA installation, device detection, and install prompt handling utilities.
frontend/src/lib/symbols.ts: Defines whitelisted Binance symbols and a helper for symbol normalization.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point mounting React with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/service-worker.ts: Service worker implementing asset precaching, cache cleanup, and caching strategies for offline support.
frontend/src/surfaces/FuturesMonitorTabS: Standalone Futures Monitor layout with header, content, and footer.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, neon color safelist, custom OKLCH color tokens, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Binance futures positions app, current features, issues, and pending requests for USD‑M/COIN‑M position reading and unified analysis.
